title: The Urge
content:
's better that you forgot about it. But you want to know, don't you? Special, yes, special, aren't you? Ssh, don't fight it. You know what you need to do. Take up that knife, do what you do best. Easy as breathing. You'll fell better after.

Get over it! Spill more blood!

Oh, don't look so scandalised. This is definitely not the first time you've done thid. Quil have have grown up to become the age's great songstress, byt you - you can be the msot prolific killer in the history of the Realms! I
